name: HALOPractice
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: halo practice
des:
Emergency medical providers are responsible for performing critical procedures with little or no advance notice. However, some of these procedures rarely occur, and they are sometimes called "high acuity low occurrence" (HALO) procedures. With the HALO Practice skill, medical professionals can stay proficient at these procedures by mentally rehearsing them with Alexa. 

HOW DOES IT WORK?
Just ask your Alexa to open HALO Practice. You can ask to practice a specific procedure or ask Alexa to read you a list of available procedures. 

WHAT PROCEDURES ARE AVAILABLE?
Lateral canthotomy
Transvenous pacing
Cricothyrotomy
Needle cricothyrotomy
Pericardiocentesis
Resuscitative hysterotomy
Thoracotomy
Newborn delivery

Created by: Ryan McKillip
Chief Editor: Ryan Tabor

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
